original_text: And thou shalt make a mercy seat of pure gold: two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof.
korean_text: 순금으로 속죄소를 만들되 길이는 두 규빗 반, 너비는 한 규빗 반이 되게 하고

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt make a mercy seat of pure gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 순수한 금으로 속죄소를 만들어야 할지니라

sentences.original_text: two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof
and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof
